Affinio | Backend Developers | Toronto or Halifax, Canada | Full Time | ONSITE

Come help us build tools to let users get a really, really deep understanding of social networks and their connections. Our backend is written in Scala (Play) and we've recently converted our API to GraphQL (which has been a dream to work with tbqh).

Even if you're new to Scala but your Java is up to speed, we definitely want to talk to you.

Check out the job listing here: http://www.affinio.com/careers/backend-developer-platform
